Material Type List (current list)

List can include:
{"ground stone", "fire cracked rock", "wood", "stone", "shell", "wool", "mineral", "microbotanical", "cotton", "dating sample", "chipped stone", "ceramic", "basketry", "fauna", "glass", "metal", "macrobotanical", "human remains", "hide", "architecture"}

"ceramic" = "bowl”, “jar”, “plate”, "vessel", "sherd"
"metal" = "gold", "silver"
"stone" = "stela"
"architecture" = "building", "ruins", "arch"
